keyPoints: <mark>Strong focus on front end web technologies<mark> including React, JavaScript, HTML5, Webpack, WordPress, CSS3, and Sass.
Work in an <mark>agile environment<mark> closely with product owners, designers, and fellow developers.
Main efforts go into <mark>improving end user experience<mark>, increasing traffic through search engine optimization, and acquiring new users through various experiences on Peer Insights.
Conducted rigorous technical screens of applicants to <mark>assess algorithmic aptitude and logical thinking<mark> in JavaScript, Ruby, Python, and Java.
Evaluated applicants' <mark>pair programming<mark> abilities, problem solving strategies, and performance under pressure.
Cared for <mark>various species of local wildlife<mark> including rabbits, snakes, birds, turtles, chinchillas, and lizards.
Demostrated <mark>proper animal handling<mark> to visitors of all ages from toddlers to adults.
Supervised all interactions between visitors and animals.
Maintained hiking and wildlife touring trails in Alley Pond Park.
Managed day to day <mark>business operations<mark> and interactions between employees and customers.
Supervised all employees and <mark>enforced safe practices<mark> in the work environment.
Monitored <mark>business data analytics<mark> such as budget, profit/loss, and stock maintenance.
Handled registration and discharge of patients to ensure they felt <mark>welcome and prioritized.<mark>
Coordinated with insurance companies for <mark>optimal patient healthcare<mark>.
Maintained a <mark>safe and sanitary<mark> work environment for patients and co-workers.
